title: No Such King
description: A puppet, a prince, and a playboy. One arranged marriage. Three men I must keep at arm's length.Prince August is arrogant, toxic, and viscous.I want nothing to do with the man that was once my best friend.I fled this kingdom four years ago, planning to never return.But the king is dead.The kingdom is in chaos.And I’m trapped in an arranged marriage I want no part of.August could ruin me with a single touch.I hate him.I want him.My duty makes it impossible to walk away.But the bitter future king has more enemies than just me.Heavy is the crown.Deadly, are the crown’s enemies.This is a reverse harem romance.
author: Coralee June
